partitioning.caption: Partitioning
partitioning.description: Create separate partitions for specific paths

partition_options.caption: Local non-root partition options
partition_options.description: Option "nodev" must be specified for non-root partitions

removable_partition_options.caption: Removable storage partition options
removable_partition_options.description: Options "nodev", "nosuid" and "noexec" must be specified for removable partitions

temporary_partition_options.caption: Temporary storage partition check
temporary_partition_options.description: Options "nodev", "nosuid" and "noexec" must be specified for temporary partitions

modprobe_usb_driver_loading.caption: Modprobe USB storage driver loading
modprobe_usb_driver_loading.description: Disable modprobe loading of USB storage driver loading

uncommon_fs_mounting.caption: Uncommon file systems mounting
uncommon_fs_mounting.description: Disable mounting of uncommon file systems

system_file_permissions.caption: Permissions on system files
system_file_permissions.description: Verify permissions on passwd, shadow, group and gshadow

world_writable_directories.caption: World-writable directories
world_writable_directories.description: Set sticky bin on world-writable directories

world_writable_files.caption: World-writable files
world_writable_files.description: Remove global write access from world-writable files

world_writable_ownership.caption: World-writable directories ownership
world_writable_ownership.description: World-writable directories should be owned by root

sudo_configuration.caption: SUDO configuration
sudo_configuration.description: Configure sudo to improve auditing of root access

blocked_system_accounts.caption: System accounts blocking
blocked_system_accounts.description: Block shell and login access to non-root system accounts

empty_passwords.caption: Empty passwords
empty_passwords.description: Verify that no accounts have empty oassword fields

shadowed_passwords.caption: Shadowed password hashes
shadowed_passwords.description: Verify that all account password hashes are shadowed

non_root_uids.caption: Non-root accounts UID
non_root_uids.description: Verify that no non-root accounts have UID 0

legacy_plus_entries.caption: Legacy ’+’ entries
legacy_plus_entries.description: Remove legacy ’+’ Entries from password files

user_home_permissions.caption: User home permissions
user_home_permissions.description: Ensure that user home directories are not group-writable or world-readable

what.caption: Options
what.description: Any options available for UNIX find command

show_hidden.caption: Show hidden
show_hidden.description: List all files including hidden file starting with '.'

show_hidden.caption: Show hidden
show_hidden.description: list all files including hidden file starting with '.'
